thread.title: 13-year-old US boy accused in fatal shooting of girl, 12
thread.title_full: 13-year-old US boy accused in fatal shooting of girl, 12 | News24

author: news24.com
title: 13-year-old US boy accused in fatal shooting of girl, 12
text:
Jasper - A 13-year-old boy appears to have deliberately shot and killed a 12-year-old girl outside a home in rural Missouri with a gun that came from the house, police said on Friday.
Officers tried to revive the girl, Teresa J Potts, but she died on Thursday evening near the town of Jasper in front of a foster home, Jasper County Sheriff Randee Kaiser said. Jasper is about 130 miles south of Kansas City.
The boy was arrested without incident and is being held by the Jasper County Juvenile Office, Kaiser said at a news conference in nearby Carthage, adding that the boy will be charged in the shooting later on Friday. The sheriff's comments were first reported by The Joplin Globe.
"It was not a situation where they were playing. It does not appear to be a situation where it was an accident," Kaiser said.
